sources.title: First Bancorp - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: First Bancorp is an American bank holding company headquartered in Southern Pines, North Carolina, that operates as First Bank in North Carolina and South Carolina.. As of 2023, First Bancorp has 118 branches and about $12 billion in assets. [1] First Bank was the sixth largest bank in North Carolina.
